The Ardougne cloak 4 is a reward from completing the elite Ardougne Diary given to you by Two-pints in the Flying Horse Inn in East Ardougne, and can be retrieved from her for free if lost.

This cape currently offers the highest stab in the cape slot. It is often used by players when fighting the Corporeal Beast, as well as Wilderness bosses where the free expendable nature of the cape and its Prayer bonus prove useful.

A Max cape can be combined with this cloak to create an Ardougne max cape, serving as a cosmetic upgrade.

 Attack bonuses
+6+0+0+6+0
 Defence bonuses
+6+0+0+6+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+6List

Contents

  • 1 Benefits
    • 1.1 From Ardougne cloak 1, 2 and 3
    • 1.2 Ardougne cloak 4 only
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 References

Benefits[edit | edit source]

A player teleporting to the Ardougne farm patch.

From Ardougne cloak 1, 2 and 3[edit | edit source]

  • 200 death runes when trading in a cat
  • Unlimited teleports to the Ardougne Monastery
  • Ability to toggle Watchtower Teleport to the centre of Yanille
  • Even more noted drops from the Tower of Life
  • 10% increased chance of succeeding when pickpocketing around Gielinor (even if the cloak is not equipped[1])
  • Receive additional runes when crafting essence at the Ourania Altar (even if the cloak is not equipped)

Ardougne cloak 4 only[edit | edit source]

  • Unlimited teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • 250 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • 50% more fish from Fishing Trawler
  • 25% more marks of grace from the Ardougne Rooftop Course
  • Bert will automatically deliver 84 buckets of sand to the bank each day upon login (unless the player is an Ultimate Ironman).

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 April 2018
(update)

The "Teleport" option was renamed to "Monastery Teleport".

24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
23 July 2015
(update)
  • The teleport options on the Ardougne cloaks are now in a consistent order.
  • On male characters, the Mime Top's stripes no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.
16 July 2015
(update)

The dragon chainbody and dragon chainbody (g) no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.

7 May 2015
(update)

The teleports to the Ardougne monastery and farming patch have been given graphical updates.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 9 June 2017. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "No, you just need to have unlocked the diary reward."

[[File:Ardougne cloak 4 detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''Ardougne cloak 4''' is a reward from completing the elite [[Ardougne Diary]] given to you by [[Two-pints]] in the [[Flying Horse Inn]] in [[East Ardougne]], and can be retrieved from her for free if lost.

This cape currently offers the highest [[stab]] in the [[cape slot]]. It is often used by players when fighting the [[Corporeal Beast]], as well as [[Wilderness]] bosses where the free expendable nature of the cape and its Prayer bonus prove useful.

A [[Max cape]] can be combined with this cloak to create an [[Ardougne max cape]], serving as a cosmetic upgrade.

==Benefits==
[[File:Ardougne_Farm_Teleport.gif|frame|A player teleporting to the Ardougne farm patch.]]
===From [[Ardougne cloak 1]], [[Ardougne_cloak_2|2]] and [[Ardougne_cloak_3|3]]===
*200 [[death rune]]s when trading in a [[cat]]
*Unlimited teleports to the [[Ardougne Monastery]]
*Ability to toggle [[Watchtower Teleport]] to the centre of [[Yanille]]
*Even more noted drops from the [[Creature Creation|Tower of Life]]
*10% increased chance of succeeding when pickpocketing around Gielinor (even if the cloak is not equipped{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/873096746355703809|date=9 June 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/86Jds|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=No, you just need to have unlocked the diary reward.}})
*Receive additional runes when crafting essence at the [[Ourania Altar]] (even if the cloak is not equipped)

===Ardougne cloak 4 only===
*Unlimited teleports to Ardougne farm patch
*250 free noted [[pure essence]] every day from [[Wizard Cromperty]]
*50% more fish from [[Fishing Trawler]]
*25% more [[marks of grace]] from the [[Ardougne Rooftop Course]]
*[[Bert]] will automatically deliver 84 [[buckets of sand]] to the bank each day upon login (unless the player is an [[Ultimate Ironman]]).

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 12 April 2018
|update = Quality of Life Improvements
|change = The "Teleport" option was renamed to "Monastery Teleport".
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 24 March 2016
|update = White & Black Graceful
|poll = Old School Content Poll 40: Vanilla LootShare & QoL
|change = 
*It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 23 July 2015
|update = Big Cats & WWF 
|change = 
*The teleport options on the [[Ardougne cloak]]s are now in a consistent order.
*On male characters, the [[Mime Top]]'s stripes no longer render through the [[Ardougne cloak]]s.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 16 July 2015
|update = Duel Arena Rework
|change = The [[dragon chainbody]] and [[dragon chainbody (g)]] no longer render through the Ardougne cloaks.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 7 May 2015
|update = Slayer Partners & Teleports
|change = The teleports to the Ardougne monastery and farming patch have been given [[graphical updates]].
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}
